languages.text: "Элантах, твое стремление познавать, а не уничтожать из страха, делает тебе честь, но... Будь осторож{mf|ен|на} — разумы мон-кай хрупки и едва ли могут совладать с тем, что обладает столь сильной связью с вуалью".

"Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."
languages.original_text: "Элантах, твое стремление познавать, а не уничтожать из страха, делает тебе честь, но... Будь осторож{mf|ен|на} — разумы мон-кай хрупки и едва ли могут совладать с тем, что обладает столь сильной связью с вуалью".

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear is honorable, but... Be careful. The minds of mon'keigh are fragile and can hardly control something that has such a strong connection to the veil."

"Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear is honorable, but... Be careful. The minds of mon'keigh are fragile and can hardly control something that has such a strong connection to the veil."

"Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear is honourable, but... take heed: the minds of mon'keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to control something with such a strong connection to the veil."

"Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."

languages.text: "Elantach, Euer Wunsch, zu verstehen, anstatt aus Furcht zu zerstören, ehrt Euch, aber ... seid gewarnt: Der Verstand der Chem-Pan-Sey ist zerbrechlich und kann Dingen mit einer so starken Verbindung zum Schleier nur schwer widerstehen."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, Euer Wunsch, zu verstehen, anstatt aus Furcht zu zerstören, ehrt Euch, aber ... seid gewarnt: Der Verstand der Chem-Pan-Sey ist zerbrechlich und kann Dingen mit einer so starken Verbindung zum Schleier nur schwer widerstehen."

languages.text: « Elantach, il est tout à votre honneur de vouloir comprendre plutôt que de laisser la peur vous pousser à détruire, mais... méfiez-vous : les esprits des mon-keigh sont fragiles et auraient bien du mal à résister à une chose si étroitement liée au voile. »
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."

traits.locale_text: « Elantach, il est tout à votre honneur de vouloir comprendre plutôt que de laisser la peur vous pousser à détruire, mais... méfiez-vous : les esprits des mon-keigh sont fragiles et auraient bien du mal à résister à une chose si étroitement liée au voile. »

languages.text: “外界人，你渴求理解事物的本质，不会出于恐惧而诉诸破坏，这是你独有的优点。不过……要当心，猴子的思维过于脆弱，没有能力承受与面纱的联系过于紧密的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你渴求理解事物的本质，不会出于恐惧而诉诸破坏，这是你独有的优点。不过……要当心，猴子的思维过于脆弱，没有能力承受与面纱的联系过于紧密的东西。”

languages.text: «Elantach, su deseo de entender en lugar de destruir lo que teme l{mf|e|a} honra, pero... cuidado: las mentes de los mon-keigh son frágiles y no están preparadas para soportar algo con un vínculo tan intenso con el velo».
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, su deseo de entender en lugar de destruir lo que teme l{mf|e|a} honra, pero... cuidado: las mentes de los mon-keigh son frágiles y no están preparadas para soportar algo con un vínculo tan intenso con el velo».

languages.text: 「エランタよ、恐怖から破壊するのではなく理解しようとするその姿勢は称賛に値する。しかし注意せよ。モン＝ケイの心はもろく、ヴェールと強く結びついた存在に耐える力は備わっていないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、恐怖から破壊するのではなく理解しようとするその姿勢は称賛に値する。しかし注意せよ。モン＝ケイの心はもろく、ヴェールと強く結びついた存在に耐える力は備わっていないのだ」

languages.text: "Korku içinde yok etmek yerine anlama arzun takdire şayan elantach ama dikkat et... Mon-keigh zihinleri hassastır, örtüyle böylesine bağlantılı bir şeye dayanacak güçte değiller."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your desire to understand rather than destroy out of fear does your credit, but... take heed: the minds of mon-keigh are fragile and ill-equipped to withstand something with such a strong connection to the veil."
